WESTFORD, Mass., September 27, 2022 – NETSCOUT SYSTEMS, INC. (NASDAQ: NTCT) today announced findings from its 1H2022 DDoS Threat Intelligence Report. The findings demonstrate how sophisticated cybercriminals have become at bypassing defenses with new DDoS attack vectors and successful methodologies

Brooke Jameson

Brooke is a product marketing manager on the enterprise solutions team. Prior to joining NETSCOUT she worked in both sales and marketing in the cybersecurity industry, specializing in identity and access management. She holds a Bachelor of Science in Marketing from Bentley University.
